About Me

Things I Enjoy..

After a very long hiatus away from my true passion, I found my way back to designing and developing websites. I've become obsessed with the things we can do today compared to 10 years ago, from responsive design to functionality, modern websites are truly a work of art. This is my dog Daisy. She is a 100% purebred Beagle. There are two types of Beagles there are Beagles that don't exceed 13 inches in height at the shoulder and beagles that stand 13-15 inches in height at he shoulder. Daisy is 14 inches at the shoulder and still growing. She has a very wild personality and has many friends at the local dog park. In my free time you can find me at local recreational parks hiking and exploring nature. Here are some of my favorite parks around town Fletcher Park, Loyce E. Harpe Park, Circle B Bar Reserve, and Bonnet Springs Park. I also like to attend local car meets, try new restaurants and explore the many beaches nearby.
